T value

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class FunctionParameterValue< T >

A value for a function parameter. Template depending on its type.

Defines the interface declared by FunctionParameterValueBase:

  • implements setValue(const T &), leaving the other overloaded setValue() members untouched as no-ops
  • implements the type cast operators declared abstract in the base class as no-ops (the base class cant't define the default implementations of the cast operators, because this class needs to define a specialization of the operator T() - so it needs to declare all of them)
  • stores a T and gives access to it via the cast operator

See also:
FunctionParameterValueBase
